scripts.build-roc: rm platform/zig-cache -r; cd ~/roc && ./target/release/roc build ~/roc-retro/roc_src/game.roc --target=wasm32 && cd ~/roc-retro && mv roc_src/game.wasm public/game.wasm
scripts.check-roc: cd ~/roc && ./target/release/roc check ~/roc-retro/roc_src/game.roc && cd ~/roc-retro && mv roc_src/game.wasm public/game.wasm
